channel.title: Blogs on tact.moe
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on tact.moe

item.title: Apple Silicon
item.description: At WWDC 2020, Apple announced the transition of the Mac from Intel processors to to their own “Apple Silicon” processors, the same kind as the ARM based chips that power the iPhone and iPad. They also commited to shipping their first Mac with these chips before the end of 2020 and said that they intend the transition to last two years.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to a first post that isn’t really about much of anything. This will be a blog where I write about anime, tech and other assorted interests. I’m tact and I intend to post to this blog semi-regularly, or whenever I have something to say I guess.
